about_the_game:
Welcome to the soundtrack for Ever Forward. This soundtrack includes 10 original songs composed by Pathea Games studio. This is the first Disc; We may release more later.
1. Reminiscence01
2. Reminiscence03
3. Reminiscence04
4. Reminiscence05
5. Reminiscence06
6. Reminiscence07
7. Reminiscence09
8. Reminiscence011
9. Anagnorisis
10. EF Main Theme Piano
Ever forward is about A girl trapped in a strange world somewhere between reality and imagination. Help her find her way in this adventure puzzle game.
